title: scripts typeface
content:
I have looked everywhere. Typophile is my last resort.  
Can someone help me identify this typeface?

thanks in advance.

:tony

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020051731im_/http:/typophile.com/files/nonamefont_4822.gif)
author: designtn

comments.content: This looks like Jiffy with possible modifications. The uc S is identical, but the lc s looks modified, as does the r.

I found it.

It is Wendy from the Adobe Collection.

Thanks guys for your input/help.

cheers  
:tony
